long_desc.thetext:
During the latest couple of days I've contributed a PT translation for the legacy 0.7.x branch and 2.0.x (which I've found to match the trunk, as of this writing).
Unfortunately, I've found a few strings which apparently don't make sense to have been in the translated strings or which have a few inconsistencies.
String which shouldn't be in the translation resources: * "qooxdoo" [showcase] This is the framework name, should never be translated
Strings which need further clarification: * "test Hello %1!" [framework] * "test Jonny" [framework] * "test One car" [framework] * "test affe" [framework] * "test one" [framework] * "test two" [framework] These are apparently used in the testing framework but not details are provided for translators (translator notes) regarding if they should be translated or simply left untouched...
Grammar issue: * "%1 is not in the range from [%2, %3]." [framework] The range is already "[from, to]" so I believe this should simply be "%1 is not in the range [%2, %3]."
Spelling issues: * "test Jonny" [framework] * "test affe" [framework] Probably one intended "Johnny" and "monkey", respectively... ;-)
Minor inconsistency: * "%1 is not in %2" [framework] All other validation strings end with a punctuation mark, ".", so there should be no exceptions for consistency reasons.

> Strings which need further clarification: > * "test Hello %1!" [framework] > * "test Jonny" [framework] > * "test One car" [framework] > * "test affe" [framework] > * "test one" [framework] > * "test two" [framework] > These are apparently used in the testing framework but not details are provided > for translators (translator notes) regarding if they should be translated or > simply left untouched...
Just realized that is already referred in the "Translation" page [1]: «Please note: when translating the files for the frameowrk, you can ignore the terms starting with test , as they are only being used internally by the unit tests.»
Still, I guess providing translator notes would be much more clear.
Nits: "frameowrk" -> "framework" and "test ," -> "test,"
[1] http://qooxdoo.org/contrib/project/translation
Move open issues to RESOLVED – LATER, whose last comment is older than a year.
